mapper.select: select id.* from inbound_detail id left join inbound i on id.inboundId=i.id where i.foreignKey=#{foreignKey}
mapper.insert: insert into inbound_detail ( id, inboundId, productId, number, price, totalMoney, orderDetailId, goodsAllocationId, ctime, finished )values( #{detail.id}, #{detail.inboundId}, #{detail.product.id}, #{detail.number}, #{detail.price}, #{detail.totalMoney}, #{detail.orderDetailId}, #{detail.goodsAllocation.id}, #{detail.ctime}, #{detail.finished} )
